Containers.Name: NginxProxyManager
Containers.Description: This project comes as a pre-built docker image that enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Default Credentials:[/span][/b][br] [b]Username:[/b] admin@example.com [br] [b]Password:[/b] changeme

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: This is the web interface port you can access via a web browser.

Config.Name: webproxy
Config.Description: This is the HTTP port for proxying non SSL traffic.

Config.Name: webproxy-secured
Config.Description: This is Sync's UDP port for data transfers.

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: This is where NGINX configs will be stored.

Config.Name: Certificates
Config.Description: This is where certificates will be stored.
